Detailed Description

Struct describing some basic properties of a gadget.

Member Data Documentation

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::borderless

True if the gadget is borderless.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::canReceiveFocus

True if the gadget can receive focus.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::clicked

True if the gadget is currently clicked.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::decoration

True if the gadget is a decoration.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::deleted

True if the gadget has been deleted.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::doubleClickable

True if the gadget can be double-clicked.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::draggable

True if the gadget can be dragged.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::dragging

True if the gadget is being dragged.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::drawingEnabled

True if the gadget can be drawn.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::enabled

True if the gadget is enabled.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::erased

True if the gadget is currently erased from the frame buffer.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::hasFocus

True if the gadget has focus.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::hidden

True if the gadget is hidden.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::modal

True if the gadget is modal.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::permeable

True if the gadget's children can exceed its dimensions.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::shelved

True if the gadget has been shelved.

u8 WoopsiUI::Gadget::Flags::visibleRegionCacheInvalid

True if the region cache is invalid.
